title.rendered: “Strategic Aerial Strikes: Inside the IDF’s Ongoing Combat in the Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Aerial eliminations of armed squads; IDF’s combat in the Gaza Strip continues.

As a part of the ‘Yiftach’ Brigade’s combat team activity tonight in the center of the Gaza Strip, a terrorist squad that approached towards the forces was eliminated. Later, a number of terrorists who tried to ambush the soldiers were identified, and in further collaboration with the Air Force, the soldiers directed an aircraft that eliminated the terrorists.

In the northern Gaza Strip, troops from the 5th Brigade’s combat team identified an armed terrorist squad. The fighters responded with fire and eliminated one terrorist, an aircraft of the Air Force was directed to eliminate the rest of the terrorists and a fighter jet destroyed the military structure in which the squad operated.

Attached is footage from the IDF’s attacks in the Strip:
https://bit.ly/3HvDElf

Attached are pictures from the IDF’s activities in the Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC220120241984930
